actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the printing of the revised Edition of The Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives, Ninety-sixth Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of 2,000 copies of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives, as a House document, for the 96th Congress. Specifies that 700 copies shall be bound in leather with a thumb index.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the printing of the revised Edition of The Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives, Ninety-sixth Congress.
